page.title: 08COLAN BARTON FARM
page.content: There is a farm at the Fir Hill run by Mr.Thomas.The main crops are barley,cereal,dredge corn,grass and potatoes.The machines that are on the farm are tractors,one of which is called an{"ALIS CHAMBER"}which came across from the U.S.A. in the 1940s and runs on T.V.O and petrol.It is started up on petrol and when the engine is warm it is switched onto T.V.O. Mr Thomas has farmed the land for sixteen years, owning livestock like bullocks and sheep.He uses most of the grass land for grazing.All together the farm covers about 320 acres.
